item.title: Meditating on Code
item.description: Sometimes you need to gather all your attention and focus on a few lines of code. Vim has a great plugin which can help you minimize distractions.

item.title: Sending Page to Kindle From Vimperator
item.description: Lets add new command for sending page to your Kindle via Vimperator console (it uses fivefilters API):

item.title: Jumping Between Most Recently Used Files and Directories
item.description: fzf is one of these life-changing tools that can boost your productivity. Here is example of using fzf with vim history for quickly (less than 500 ms) opening files and jumping between directories.

item.title: Searching the Web With Speed of Thought Using Dmenu
item.description: If you are using i3wm, you already should be familiar with dmenu. We are going to use dmenu for input search queries and then instantly jump to the browser.

item.title: A New Beginning
item.description: This is my second attempt on blogging and this time most of the posts will be in english (need more practice with this, but I'll do my best).
